title: Apify Actor Instagram Input Schema
description: This schema represents the input data for an Apify Actor that scrapes Instagram profiles.

username.description: An array of Instagram usernames or profile URLs. Use this field to specify the profiles you want to scrape.

resultsLimit.description: The maximum number of posts you want to scrape per profile. For example, if set to 5, you'll get 5 posts for each profile provided in the 'username' array.
